title: Boston Tea Party
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Western, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Asian, British, European, French, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of a chain of cafes. Has several vegan dishes and ones that can be made vegan. Uses fresh local organic produce and all food is made-in-house to order. Clearly marked vegan choices include an all day breakfast, mushrooms on toast, porridge with soy, a sandwich or wrap and a salad. The mushroom and tomato bap can also be made vegan. Organic soy milk can be used on request for any hot drinks. Has a laid back vibe and an ethical and organic focus. Popular with students and locals.
